title: Date Period Check
description:
IS_HEX tests whether the string STR contains only hexadecimal characters
are. If another character is found the function returns FALSE. If in STR are
only hexadecimal characters included, the function returns TRUE. The heï¿¾xadecimal character are characters with the decimal code 0..9, a..f. and
A..F.
name: PERIOD2

input.name: DP
input.description: An array containing pairs of dates that define specific periods.

input.name: DX
input.description: A single date to check against the periods defined in the DP array.

return_value.description: A boolean value indicating whether the date DX is within any of the defined date periods in DP.
